news.title: Risk of undersea cable attacks backed by Russia and China likely to rise, report warns
news.summary: Risk of attacks on undersea cables carrying international internet traffic likely to rise. Spate of incidents in Baltic Sea and around Taiwan are harbinger for further disruptive activity, cybersecurity firm says. Submarine cables account for 99% of the world's intercontinental data traffic.

news.title: Inside Elon Musk’s plan to rain SpaceX’s rocket debris over Hawaii’s pristine waters
news.summary: The north-west Hawaiian island of Mokumanamana is said to be touched by the gods. It sits as a boundary between what Native Hawaiians refer to as ‘pō’ and ‘au’ The island’s steep rocky cliffs give way to indigo blue waters.

news.title: AI firms ‘unprepared’ for dangers of building human-level systems, report warns
news.summary: Future of Life Institute says companies pursuing artificial general intelligence lack credible plans to ensure safety. None of the firms on its  AI safety index scored higher than a D for ‘existential safety planning’
